snippet: Striker Wayne Rooney has been pushing for a move since the latter stages of last season, expressing frustration about his lack of playing time, but a Chelsea bid was rejected.
abstract: Manchester United rejects bid from Chelsea to sign striker Wayne Rooney.
lead_paragraph: Striker Wayne Rooney has been pushing for a move since the latter stages of last season, expressing frustration about his lack of playing time, but a Chelsea bid was rejected.

headline.main: Chelsea’s Bid for Rooney Is Rejected by Manchester United
